description:
Summary: It`s Shiina again. Machiko-san and Morino-san both got through exams and it`s time for graduation! Morino-san came to watch Machiko-san walk, she really does love her. I`m headed over to their place now with a special lunch from Tsuyuko-san. They`re going to have a pretty hectic time adjusting to their new life, so I thought I`d bring it by and help out however I can.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: しみしみ, むぎゅっ.
